meanings.definition: A child, typically one who is badly behaved
meanings.sent1: The little brat refused to share his toys with the other kids.
meanings.sent2: The teacher had to discipline the brat for throwing a tantrum in class.
meanings.sent3: The brat thought it was funny to hide his sister's favorite doll.
meanings.sent4: The brat's mischievous grin gave away his plan to sneak out of the house.
meanings.sent5: The noisy brat made it impossible for the librarian to concentrate.

meanings.definition: A person, especially a child, who is annoying or spoilt
meanings.sent1: That brat always interrupts our conversations with his loud voice.
meanings.sent2: The spoiled brat demanded a new toy every time they went to the store.
meanings.sent3: The brat insisted on having the biggest slice of cake at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her bratty behavior made it hard for others to enjoy the family gathering.
meanings.sent5: The little brat's constant whining grated on everyone's nerves.
